alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Coffee; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:05PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Rutherford, northwestern Coffee, southwestern Wilson and Cannon Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 605 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Woodbury, Smyrna, La Vergne, Walterhill, Auburntown, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Lascassas, Bradyville, Milton and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 between mile markers 66 and 95. Interstate 840 between mile markers 50 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
